Title: Establishes procurement goals for New York state food products purchased by state agencies
Summary: Establishes procurement goals that certain percentages of all food and food products purchased by state agencies shall be New York state food products.
LawCode: Add ยง163-e, amd ยง165, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing procurement goals for the purchase of New York state food products by state agencies
